reviewText: Very moving - I was doing research and have watched all sorts of DVD's on the subject: this one has a lot of personal stories and this is what makes the whole event real for those not around when the bomb was dropped.  We hear all the time of reducing the nuclear arms race...but this video really hits home (combined with the CD book "last train out of heroshima", you get a good idea of not only the miracle of science but the inhumanity of man.
